name: Ark of Panda
description: Ark of Panda is a BNB Chain ecosystem bridging Web2 and Web3, enabling users to tokenize real-world assets and brands into tradable digital assets, supported by AI-driven UGC tools for creating personalized 3D assets, clan-based shared dividends for community loyalty, and an on-chain quest system rewarding contributions to foster a sustainable, collaborative economy. Additionally, Ark of Panda has partnered with well-known celebrities, esports champions, music artists, and Olympic athletes. The platform supports over 20 projects with ecosystem integration, traffic interchange, economic model design, and technical infrastructure, encompassing public chains, blockchain games, and NFT communities.
